front.title: Limitations exist in IP mobility support applications

abstract.t: There already exist several mobility support solutions and eachsolution uses its own method to achieve specific goals.Butdifferent solutions may not work properly when they are combined inan integrated application environment because network entities havelittle information about each other.Specially when PMIP meet with theNemo network environment something need to be considered more. This document describes several limitations on NEMO application and provides a possible solution.
